titleStmt.title: A vvord to England touching their fastings· Sent in a letter, from a godly Christian to his private friend, to be presented to the publicke view of the magistrates, ministers, and people of this Kingdome.
titleStmt.author: T. W.

notesStmt.note: Annotations on Thomason copy: "Jan: 17"; the "8" in imprint date has been crossed out and replaced with a "7".
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
